open.author.name: Marek Marecki
message:
Attributes

Apply attributes to various elements of source code.
Attributes would be used to alter behaviour of the elements they
are attached to, or guide the assembler in how they should be
analysed.

Example:

    .function: foo/0
        ; ...
    .end
    .function: [[no_sa]] bar/0
        ; ...
    .end

Function 'bar/0' would be be statically analysed because of the
'no_sa' attribute.
project.name: Viua Virtual Machine
close.author.name: Marek Marecki
